languages.text: {n}Капеллан смотрит на вас не слишком приязненно, но кивает.{/n} "Вы — представитель фон Валанциус, можете попробовать оспорить завещание, если вам угодно".
{n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You represent House von Valancius, you can certainly try to call the will into question if you so wish."
languages.original_text: {n}Капеллан смотрит на вас не слишком приязненно, но кивает.{/n} "Вы — представитель фон Валанциус, можете попробовать оспорить завещание, если вам угодно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You represent the von Valancius, you can certainly try to call the will into question if you so wish."
{n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You represent the von Valancius, you can certainly try to call the will into question if you so wish."
{n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You represent House von Valancius, you can certainly try to call the will into question if you so wish."
{n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You represent House von Valancius, you can certainly try to call the will into question if you so wish."
{n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You represent House von Valancius, you can certainly try to call the will into question if you so wish."

languages.text: {n}牧师用不太友好的眼神看着你，但还是点了点头。{/n}“你是冯·瓦兰修斯家族的代表。如果你有这个意愿，你确实可以对遗嘱提出质疑。”
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You represent House von Valancius, you can certainly try to call the will into question if you so wish."

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师用不太友好的眼神看着你，但还是点了点头。{/n}“你是冯·瓦兰修斯家族的代表。如果你有这个意愿，你确实可以对遗嘱提出质疑。”

languages.text: {n}Capellán te lanza una mirada hostil, pero asiente.{/n} «Como representante de la casa von Valancius, tiene derecho a cuestionar el testamento si lo desea».
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You represent House von Valancius, you can certainly try to call the will into question if you so wish."

traits.locale_text: {n}Capellán te lanza una mirada hostil, pero asiente.{/n} «Como representante de la casa von Valancius, tiene derecho a cuestionar el testamento si lo desea».

languages.text: {n}教戒官は友好的とはいいがたい表情を見せたが、うなずいた。{/n}「あなたはフォン・ヴァランシウス家の代表なのですから、遺言について自由に発言する権限がございます」
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You represent House von Valancius, you can certainly try to call the will into question if you so wish."

traits.locale_text: {n}教戒官は友好的とはいいがたい表情を見せたが、うなずいた。{/n}「あなたはフォン・ヴァランシウス家の代表なのですから、遺言について自由に発言する権限がございます」

languages.text: {n}Ordenspriester wirft dir einen unfreundlichen Blick zu, nickt aber.{/n} "Ihr repräsentiert das Haus von Valancius und könnt das Testament anfechten, wenn es Euch beliebt."
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You represent House von Valancius, you can certainly try to call the will into question if you so wish."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ordenspriester wirft dir einen unfreundlichen Blick zu, nickt aber.{/n} "Ihr repräsentiert das Haus von Valancius und könnt das Testament anfechten, wenn es Euch beliebt."

languages.text: {n}Chapelain vous lance un regard hostile, mais se contente de hocher la tête.{/n} « En tant que {mf|représentant|représentante} de la maison von Valancius, il est de votre droit de remettre le testament en question, si c'est là votre souhait. »
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You represent House von Valancius, you can certainly try to call the will into question if you so wish."

traits.locale_text: {n}Chapelain vous lance un regard hostile, mais se contente de hocher la tête.{/n} « En tant que {mf|représentant|représentante} de la maison von Valancius, il est de votre droit de remettre le testament en question, si c'est là votre souhait. »

languages.text: {n}Papaz sana pek dostane olmayan bir bakış atsa da başını sallıyor.{/n} "Siz von Valancius Hanesi'ni temsil ediyorsunuz. Dileğiniz buysa vasiyeti sorgulamak pek tabii hakkınızdır."
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You represent House von Valancius, you can certainly try to call the will into question if you so wish."

traits.locale_text: {n}Papaz sana pek de dostane olmayan bir bakış atıyor ama başını sallıyor.{/n} "Siz Von Valancius Hanesi'ni temsil ediyorsunuz. Dileğiniz buysa pek tabii vasiyeti sorgulamak size düşer."
